com.plusauth.android.api.request

Interface AuthenticationRequest

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Request<Credentials,AuthenticationException>

    public interface AuthenticationRequest
extends Request<Credentials,AuthenticationException>
    Request to authenticate a user with OIDC api
